dialogue.speaker: Charlie

dialogue.speaker: Charlie

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I've discovered that Bob is the assassin. I'd like to bring this to the attention of the villager, Charlie, and propose a vote against Bob.
